Citation_Information.description: PDS3 ODY ACCELEROMETER Data Set Description

Modification_Detail.description: This file was modified to convert to PDS4 standards

Mars Odyssey Upper Atmospheric Properties Data Records Generated from Accelerometer Measurements During Aerobraking, Version 1.0

Document.description: Data Set Overview ================= This dataset consists of data products derived from data collected by the Accelerometer (ACC) on Mars Odyssey (ODY) during its aerobraking in the martian atmosphere. The DATA/ directory contains four subdirectories: DATA/RAW/, DATA/PROF/, DATA/ANC/ and DATA/CALT/. DATA/RAW/ contains low rate and high rate data for each orbit. DATA/PROF/ contains density profiles for each orbit. DATA/ANC/ contains ancilliary information about each orbit. DATA/CALT/ contains densities and density scale heights at constant altitudes.
